tag_list: semerda, ernest-semerda, gtdfaster, readinglist, coupons, purpleblue
overview:
Founded Purpleblue Pty Ltd as 24yo, CTO of Couponstar, Couponstar acquired by Coupons.com in late 2011, launched mobile productivity iphone app GTDfaster.com and opened books ReadingList on Facebook to the world.

Ernest holds a Bsc. Comp Sci & MBA from AGSM.

If you are considering coming to Silicon Valley visit Ernest’s blog on what it takes to move and work in Silicon Valley: http://theroadtosiliconvalley.com/
